tool.name: Montage - required
tool.description: Stitches together a matrix of images.

param.name: input_image_path
param.label: Enter path to images that need to be montaged. Example: BackgroundCorrected

param.name: output_results_path
param.label: Enter path to output destination. Example: MontagedImages

tool.help: Creates a montage of specified matrix dimensions.
